troubleshooting.title: System will not turn on
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Everything looks right, but the system still does not start.

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: The system is plugged in, the power switch is on, but the system does not start.

cause.p: The problem is usually caused due to power not being supplied through the electrical outlet. Often, a circuit breaker has been tripped.

step.cmd: Turn the system power switch to Off.
Turn the system power switch to On.
